leukapp.apps.individuals.admin module¶

Admin settings for the individuals application. To learn more see the Django admin site documentation.

class IndividualAdmin(model, admin_site)[source]¶

Bases: django.contrib.admin.options.ModelAdmin

Class to manage Individuals from the admin site.

inlines = [<class 'leukapp.apps.individuals.admin.SpecimenInline'>]¶

List InLine objects to be added.

media¶
class SpecimenInline(parent_model, admin_site)[source]¶

Bases: django.contrib.admin.options.StackedInline

Enable the creation of extra Specimens.

The admin interface has the ability to edit models on the same page as a parent model. These are called inlines. See InLineModelAdmin objects.

extra = 2¶

Number of extra Specimens that can be created.

media¶
model¶

Name of InLine model.

alias of Specimen
